on_join_message: Hello and welcome! Please let me know what I can help you with and a team of highly-experienced experts will contact you back M-F 8AM-5PM ET. Please allow a few minutes so that we can craft a personalized response to your query. You can ask for information about Wells, questions about our website, or jump right into your Wells question.
on_away_response: Currently, all our humans are busy. We will get back to you within our business hours M-F 8AM-5PM ET.
on_help_response: Let us know how we can help and we will send the message through to our team of human experts. Please wait as we get back to you M-F 8AM-5PM ET.
on_teams_response: Your response has been received by our human team and you will receive a response during our business hours M-F 8AM-5PM ET.
